issue.title: [R] Bindings for min/max aggregation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13502](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13502). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This one is tricky because the arrow function is min_max, which returns a struct(min, max). So how do we translate that back to what the user asked for if they want just min or max?
